reviews.review_msg: Worst prof ever, so disorganized and unfair. Interesting to see that she used to teach at SFU but now is at Okanagan College, why would she go from a top ranked university to a sucky community college (I go to OC so I can say this). Must be because she is not a very good prof.

I really enjoyed having Linda as a professor. Very understanding, and helpful. Gives great feedback. Lectures are long, but interesting and she makes class fun. Would take again if I had the opportunity.
